name: r2-starter-kit
description: R^2 Starter Kit is an boilerplate for web development built on top of React, Redux and Webpack based on Node.js environment, also containing webpack loader such as react-hmr and babel 6.

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --host localhost --port 8080 --colors --hot --inline --config webpack.config.js  --history-api-fallback true
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=./src mocha $(find test -name *.test.jsx) --compilers js:babel-core/register --require 'test/setup.jsx' --require ignore-styles
scripts.test:cov: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=./src babel-node -- ./node_modules/.bin/isparta cover -x 'dist/*.js' --include '**/*.js' --include '**/*.jsx' _mocha -- 'test/**/*.test.jsx' --recursive --require 'test/setup.jsx' --require ignore-styles
